Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with traces of a light-brown painted slip and remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394917) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394917)
